Module count

Package count.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GLDParameters
    Common interface for values associated with model parameters.
    MixedRateModel
    Rate variation
    MixedRateModel.RateMultipliers  
    ML.BoundedParameter
    Model parameter with simultaneous tracking of its complement.
    ML.ModelParameter
    Model parameters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ancestor
    Likelihood computations for ancestral reconstruction at a node.
    AncestorPosteriors  
    DirectEM
    Expectation-maximization algorithm using ancestor copies, using DirectLikelihood.
    DirectLikelihood
    Likelihood computation by direct application of Felsenstein's peeling method, conditioning on ancestor copies.
    EM Deprecated. 
    FreeMixedModel  
    GammaInvariant
    Rate variation model: gamma + invariant rate factors for edge length, loss, duplication and transfer.
    Gradient
    Computation of likelihood derivatives.
    Likelihood
    Algorithms for computing conditional likelihoods bottom-up.
    LikelihoodDispersion
    Experimental code used during development.
    MixedDistributionGradient
    Experimental code.
    MixedRateGradient
    Computing the likelihood and its base-rate gradient in a rate-multiplier model.
    MixedRateLikelihood
    Test class for calculating the likelihood in a mixed model.
    MixedRatePosteriors
    Algorithms for computing posteriors in a rate-variation model.
    ML
    Root class for model parameter setting by likelihood maximization, defining the common interface for extending classes.
    ML.BoundedLogistic
    Logistic transformation for range[0,max].
    ML.Logarithmic
    Logarithmic transformation for parameter 0 ≤ θ
    ML.Logistic
    Logistic transformation for parameter 0 ≤ θ ≤ A.
    MLDistribution
    Maximum likelihood for one-class model using distribution parameters (loss probability, duplication probability and gain rate).
    MLFreeMixed Deprecated. 
    MLGamma
    Maximum likelihood for GammaInvariant model using rate and shape parameters.
    MLMixedRate
    Maximum likelihood for multi-class model with rate parameters and multipliers.
    MLPhylogeny
    Experimental code for phylogeny reconstruction from copy-number data.
    MLRates  
    MLTotalRates Deprecated. 
    ParametricBootstrap
    Experimental code.
    Parsimony
    Parsimony algorithms.
    Parsimony.SPRExplorer  
    Posteriors  
    RELL
    Joint evaluation of a set of rate models by bootstrapping.
    SimulatedEvolution
    Precise, simulation of copy number evolution based on copy-level discrete events.
    TreeWithRates
    Basic class for storing rate parameters on tree edges.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description

    Posteriors.FamilyEvent
